SPOT
July 29, 2019
HKEX Connect Hall

SPOT

Cryptocurrency Exchanges

250 decision makers from the world's leading cryptocurrency exchanges are coming together at the old trading floor of the Hong Kong stock exchange to discuss collaboration, industry standards, technology and regulation. SPOT is a not-for-profit initiative by the Bitcoin Association of Hong Kong.

See the 2018 line-up here

Register Here
